data.class: Optional, String: Extra classes to apply to the column
data.aria: Optional, Object: all the keys of the aria object are turned into aria-key attributes eg aria: {hidden: "false"} would translate to aria-hidden: "false"
data.id: Optional, String: An id to use?
data.role: Optional, String: Any role the column should take
data.style: Optional, String: Any extra inline styles

content: Content of ux-col is yielded to
